content: the mkal christmas stocking is a vancouver island/pacific north west inspired christmas stocking each day in december 6 row will be released with the complete pattern being fully released by december 24 just in time for use for use christmas eve/day you are free to use different gauges of yarns to make a bigger or smaller stocking feel free to embellish the stocking with beads mohair or sparkly yarns the creativity is yours to explore using dk cause you will need 100g of colour a and 50g for both colours b & c
